rev.comment: /* Further reading */ Removing links to seemingly randomly-selected Scientology-published material. Never place less-relevant links first; doing so is the sign of a link spammer.
/* Scientology as a religion */ condensed lists of links in the middle of an article--not appropriate encyclopedic style, renders the article unreadable.
/* Scientology vs. the Internet */ rewrite without quotes or motive allegations
Talk page says POV, so the notice should be on the article
/* Further reading */ Don't tell me this section is neutral, because it isn't, allow to balance things.
/* Scientology vs. the Internet */ This section is innacurate
/* Controversy and criticism */ Forgeries, etc. and sorted list to reflect most obvious controversies first. Note the mention of Snow White and the IRS doesnt mention the facts of COS v. IRS 1991
Introduction was not neutral see talk
moved mention of controversy back to intro grafs
The US government doesn't "recognize" any group as a religion, Scientology or otherwise
